short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Show the current time on toolbar and small calendar on popup window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Press on the extension button to show popup window. Click on date picker to show calendar.
Use "Options" dialog to switch Am/Pm mode to off or select font color.
